thread.title: Three killed, 12 injured in explosion near Congress road show in Bhatinda | The Indian Express
thread.title_full: Three killed, 12 injured in explosion near Congress road show in Bhatinda | The Indian Express

title: Three killed, 12 injured in explosion near Congress road show in Bhatinda | The Indian Express
text:
Three killed, 12 injured in explosion near Congress road show in Bhatinda Three killed, 12 injured in explosion near Congress road show in Bhatinda The incident took place near the venue of the road show of Congress leader Harminder Singh Jassi, who is contesting the upcoming assembly polls. By: ANI | Bhatinda | Updated: February 1, 2017 12:37 am At least twelve people were killed and one injured in an explosion at Maur Mandi near Bhatinda late this evening. (Representational Image) 
At least twelve people were killed and one injured in an explosion at Maur Mandi near Bhatinda late this evening. The incident took place near the venue of the road show of Congress leader Harminder Singh Jassi, who is contesting the upcoming polls in the state from the Maur assembly seat. 
WATCH WHAT ELSE IS IN THE NEWS 
The explosive, as reported by SDM Maur Latif Ahmed, was planted in a car at the spot.
